summary: While investigating his own blackmailing, a young politician uncovers his family's deep secrets.
cast: James Spader|Joanne Whalley|Jason Robards|Charlotte Lewis|Michael Warren|Piper Laurie|Michael Parks|Chuck McCann|Charles Haid|Chino 'Fats' Williams|Woody Strode|Jeff Perry|Galyn Görg|Justine Shapiro|George Cheung|Phillip Carter|Ron Gural|Fred Lewis|Graham Timbes|Steve Forrest|Lionel Ferbos|Bernard Zette|Sally Ann Roberts|Jim Gleason|Wendy Gardner|Jantonio Turner
title: El peso de la corrupción
